pages.text: First-Aid is a rare ability that makes the gem give off a healing pulse at a set interval. If the gem has an emotional outburst, they will damage all entities nearby instead.
$(l)Gems that are guaranteed to have it$()$(li)N/A$(br2) $(l)Gems that have a chance to have it$()$(li)Quartz$(li)Agate$(li)Jasper
